column4: Hello i'm using  AMD K6-2, 533 MHz, L1: 32KB  256RAM 10 GB , can i use perfectly ubuntu ?
Hello i'm using  AMD K6-2, 533 MHz, L1: 32KB  256RAM 10 GB , can i use perfectly ubuntu ? and i need to download a especific iso or something ?
more memory would be a big help
bummer, even 512 would be a huge help
what do you think ? i can get more ram ... :/
you could get Xubuntu Alternate CD, and use the text-based installer
or you could stick some more memory in, which will make your whole experience a lot more fun
what do you mean alternate ? is not the normal cd?
http://www.xubuntu.org/get , which one is the alternate cd
go here -> http://www.xubuntu.org/get and pick your local mirror, then download the alternate install CD for your computer
you almost certainly want the PC Intel X86 one
i'm downloaiding the PC (Intel x86) alternate install CD i ok right? 682M
